DOC.brief_summary: Medical call center phone advice protocol within hospital cardiac arrest France . The purpose present study compare group patient protocol phone advice deliver dispatcher ( `` CONTARM '' group ) versus usual phone advice ( `` CONTHAB '' group ) . Comparison perform survival seven day . The hypothesis CONTARM group high survival seven day . A second goal measure survival 15 30 day . The trial randomize , control include 2600 patient . The patient enrol 19 hospital France .
DOC.brief_title: Out Hospital Cardiac Arrest : Trial Assessing Survival Impact Phone Advice
DOC.criteria: > 18 year old initial call 15 hospital cardiac arrest patient proximity witness first aid professional site rigor mortis location allow resuscitation inability realize action misunderstand flow > 5 minute
